pages.index: StilusDomus - Elevating Interior Design and Decoration Write us Elevating Interior Design and Décor Learn more ➔ Contact us ☎ About us Welcome to StilusDomus At StilusDomus, we believe that every space has the potential to be transformed into something extraordinary. As a leading provider of interior design and decoration services, we specialize in bringing our clients' visions to life with creativity, precision, and attention to detail. Our team of experienced designers and decorators is dedicated to delivering personalized solutions tailored to meet the unique needs and preferences of each client. From concept development to project completion, we collaborate closely with our clients every step of the way to ensure that their spaces reflect their individual style and personality. Our Services Interior Design Consultation Collaborate with our experienced designers to conceptualize and plan the perfect design scheme for your space. Space Planning Optimize your space for functionality and aesthetics with our expert space planning solutions. Custom Furniture Design Elevate your interiors with bespoke furniture pieces tailored to your unique style and requirements. Color Consulting Discover the perfect color palette to enhance the mood and atmosphere of your space with our professional color consulting services. Decorative Accessories Put the finishing touches on your space with our curated selection of decorative accessories, from artwork to accent pieces. Project Management Sit back and relax as our team manages every aspect of your project, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience from start to finish. Unveiling StilusDomus: By the Numbers Discover the Quantifiable Excellence of Our Interior Design Services 500 Satisfied Clients 10+ Years of Experience 95% Customer Satisfaction Rate 100+ Successful Projects Completed Experience the StilusDomus Advantage Tailored Solutions: We understand that every client is unique, which is why we offer personalized design solutions tailored to your specific preferences, style, and requirements. Attention to Detail: From the initial consultation to the final finishing touches, we pay meticulous attention to every detail, ensuring a flawless execution of your vision. Professionalism: With years of experience in the industry, our team of skilled designers and decorators brings professionalism and expertise to every project, ensuring top-notch results and client satisfaction. Innovative Design: We stay abreast of the latest design trends and techniques, infusing creativity and innovation into every project to create spaces that are both timeless and trendsetting. Customer-Centric Approach: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We prioritize open communication, transparency, and collaboration throughout the design process, ensuring that your needs are met every step of the way. Reviews Emily R. "Absolutely Stunning Results! Working with StilusDomus was a pleasure from start to finish. Their team listened attentively to my ideas and preferences and translated them into a design that exceeded my expectations. The attention to detail and quality of workmanship were impeccable. My home has been transformed into a beautiful and functional space that I absolutely love!" Michael S. "Professionalism at Its Best. I cannot recommend StilusDomus highly enough. From the initial consultation to the final installation, their professionalism and expertise were evident every step of the way. They were responsive to my needs and preferences, and the end result was a beautifully curated space that perfectly reflects my style. I am thrilled with the outcome and would not hesitate to work with them again." Sophia M. "Exceeded Expectations! I am blown away by the transformation that StilusDomus has achieved in my home. Their attention to detail and creative vision turned my ideas into a reality that far exceeded my expectations. The team was communicative, professional, and a pleasure to work with throughout the entire process. I am thrilled with the results and would highly recommend StilusDomus to anyone looking for top-notch interior design services." Daniel K. "A True Design Partner. StilusDomus truly understands the art of interior design. They took the time to understand my vision and lifestyle and created a design that was not only beautiful but also functional. Their ability to balance aesthetics with practicality is unmatched. The team was collaborative, communicative, and dedicated to ensuring that every detail was perfect. I am incredibly grateful for their expertise and would not hesitate to work with them again in the future." Let's Bring Your Vision to Life Ready to transform your space into something truly extraordinary? Our team at StilusDomus is here to make it happen. Whether you're dreaming of a cozy home retreat or a stylish office space, we're passionate about bringing your vision to life. Contact us today to schedule a consultation and take the first step towards creating the space of your dreams. Your design journey starts here. Write us Terms of cooperation Project Consultation Before commencing any project, we conduct a comprehensive consultation to understand your vision, requirements, and preferences. This allows us to tailor our services to your specific needs and ensure a personalized approach to every project. Contract Agreement Upon finalizing the project scope and design proposal, we provide a detailed contract agreement outlining the terms, timelines, and payment schedules. This contract serves as a mutual understanding between StilusDomus and our clients, ensuring transparency and clarity throughout the project. Project Execution and Delivery Once the contract is signed, our team begins the project execution phase, meticulously bringing your design vision to life. We maintain open communication channels throughout the process, providing regular updates and ensuring that the project is completed to your satisfaction and delivered on time. Feel free to contact us with any inquiries, questions, or to schedule a consultation. We're here to help you bring your design dreams to life. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - StilusDomus Write us Privacy Policy Data Security: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Access to your personal information is restricted to authorized personnel only, and we regularly review and update our security protocols to ensure the highest level of protection. Third-Party Disclosure: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or as necessary to provide our services. We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you, as long as they agree to keep your information confidential. Marketing Communications: We may use your contact information to send you promotional materials, newsletters, or updates about our services, but only if you have opted in to receive such communications. You have the right to opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time by following the instructions provided in the emails or by contacting us directly. Retention of Information: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law. Upon request, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, unless we are legally obligated to retain it. Children's Privacy: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child without parental consent, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible. Links to Third-Party Websites: Our website may contain links to third-party websites for your convenience and reference. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit to understand how they collect, use, and protect your information. Updates to Privacy Policy: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. It is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at stilusdomus@gmail.com.We are committed to addressing any issues promptly and transparently. Our contacts Email: stilusdomus@gmail.com Phone: +919873544888 Adress: New Delhi, Delhi, India Info Privacy Contact
pages.thank: Thank You - StilusDomus Thank you We want to extend our sincerest gratitude for reaching out to StilusDomus. Your interest in our interior design services is truly appreciated, and we're excited about the opportunity to collaborate with you. Rest assured, our team is already reviewing your inquiry and will be in touch shortly. In the meantime, feel free to explore our portfolio and gather inspiration for your upcoming project. We can't wait to bring your design vision to life and create a space that reflects your unique style and personality. Thank you again for considering StilusDomus for your interior design needs.
